Issue.creator: mbwhite
Issue.summary: X509 Library needs to be locked to 0.3.3
Issue.description: ) at new ClientIdentity (/usr/local/src/node_modules/fabric-shim/lib/chaincode.js:251:38) *Workaround* within the chaincode explicitly add the x509 library at a 0.3.3 level. `npm install --save x509@0.3.3` We'll fix at the 0.3.3; release-1.3 https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/28312 FAB-13364 Lock x509 level release-1.2 https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/28313 FAB-13364 Lock x509 level release-1.3 https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/28313 FAB-13364 Lock x509 level >
